title.en: Prayer to Khyentse, Kongtrul and Chokling

text.en: Regent of Padmasambhava, Ösel Dongak Lingpa,
text.en-trans: pemé gyaltsab ösal do ngak ling

text.en: Great emanated tertön, Chokgyur Dechen Lingpa,
And gentle lord, Chimé Tennyi Yungdrung Lingpa—
text.en-trans: jam gön chimé ten nyi yungdrung ling

text.en: Heartfully, I pray to you: inspire me with your blessings.
text.en-trans: nying né soldeb dak gyü jingyi lob
